description: Proposed construction of a ground, second and third floor rear extension together with mansard extension to provide an additional self contained unit.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5f872217-7fff-11dc-8af7-565505b54a4d"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed rear extensions by virtue of their position, massing and detailed design, </span><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">would result in an incongruous and unsympathetic addition that would be detrimental to the character and appearance of the application dwelling and wider terrace. </span><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">As such, the proposal is considered contrary to the NPPF, policies D3 (Optimising Site Capacity Through the Design-Led Approach) and D4 (Delivering Good Design) of the London Plan (2021), policy LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) of Hackney’s Local Plan 2033 (2020) and the relevant sections Hackney’s Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).</span></span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed conversion, because it fails to provide a suitable mix of units, including a family-sized unit, is contrary to policy LP14 (Dwelling size mix) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020), and policies H10 (Housing size mix) of the London Plan (2021).</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c774fe51-7fff-3e4a-ce49-ce930cc31920"></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.3800000000000001; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposal, by reason of its failure to provide a contribution for affordable housing, represents an unsustainable form of development. As such the proposal is contrary to policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP13 (Affordable Housing) of the Hackney Local Plan (2020) and the Supplementary Planning Document: S106 Planning Contributions (2020).</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ced941e4-7fff-5d18-82ff-67c81ad59c00"></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-afbf9a43-7fff-762b-be61-2c5934aecd23"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposal would have a detrimental impact on the amenity of the neighbouring occupiers as it would result in an unneighbourly form of development that would increase overlooking and reduce privacy and result in harmful overshadowing to some of the neighbouring properties and amenity space. As such, the proposal is considered contrary to LP2 (Development and Amenity) of&nbsp; Hackney’s Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></span><br></p>
